data.name: Tactical Intervention - Anniversary Counter-Terrorist Pack
data.detailed_description:
Counter-Terrorist Anniversary DLC Pack

Celebrating the first full year of Tactical Intervention's public operations this DLC offers Counter-Terrorist enthusiasts an exciting collection of unique weapon skins, equipment and character skins.

This pack unlocks the following exclusive items:
  • Gign, GSG-9, Devgru and SDU characters in custom outfits
  • Custom painted ballistic shield equipment item
  • Desert Digital camo skin for the M4 Rifle*
  • Woodland camo skin for the Mp7 SMG*

*Weapon items themselves are not included in this DLC package
data.about_the_game:

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 7600 / ATI Radeon™ X800
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS X 10.6.6
  • Processor: 2GHz Intel Core Duo Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 2400 / NVidia 8600M
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
